p: During the first 2 h of drying process, probably because of the different loadings of drier, Wr linearly decreased in SD biomass (R 2 adj = 97.6%), while for VMD1 and VMD2 biomass (maximum loading capacity) the decrease of Wr over time followed the Square root-X model (VMD1, R 2 adj = 97.6%; VMD2, R 2 adj = 96.6%).
